00098   class subtable_cell

00105     {
00106       data_ = 0;
00107       valueIndex_ = -1;
00108     }
00109 
00110     subtable_cell(uint64_t data, uint64_t valueIdx)
00111     {
00112       data_ = data;
00113       valueIndex_ = valueIdx;
00114     }

00117     {

00122     bool save(FILE* f)
00123     {
00124       if (fwrite(&data_, sizeof(KeyType), 1, f) != 1)
00125         return false;
00126 
00127       if (fwrite(&valueIndex_, sizeof(uint64_t), 1, f) != 1)
00128         return false;
00129 
00130       return true;
00131     }

00136         return false;

00197   using AccessMethod<KeyType, ValueType>::insert;
00198   
00199   virtual bool insert(const DataType<KeyType,ValueType>& data)
00200   {
00201     uint64_t x = str_hash(data.key);
00202 
00203     uint64_t valueIdx = dataVec_.size();
00204     dataVec_.push_back(data.value);
00205     
00206     update_count_++;
00207     
00208     if (update_count_>M_)
00209     {
00210       //      finish = clock();
00211       //      insert_time1_ += finish-start;
00212       return rehashAll(x, valueIdx);
00213     }
00214     
00215     
00216     uint64_t j = hashFunc(main_k_, main_u_, main_p_, mainT_size_, x);
00217     if (pMainT_[j].pSub_!=NULL)
00218     {
00219       //cout<<"insert: if (pMainT_[j].pSub_!=NULL)\n";
00220       uint64_t sub_j = hashFunc(pMainT_[j].k_, pMainT_[j].u_, pMainT_[j].p_, pMainT_[j].s_, x);
00221 
00222       if (pMainT_[j].pSub_!=NULL && pMainT_[j].pSub_[sub_j].data_==x)
00223       {
00224         //cout<<"insert: if (pMainT_[j].pSub_!=NULL && pMainT_[j].pSub_[sub_j].data_==x)\n";
00225         pMainT_[j].pSub_[sub_j].valueIndex_ = valueIdx;
00226         //        finish = clock();
00227         //        insert_time1_ += finish-start;
00228         return true;
00229       }
00230     
00231       if (pMainT_[j].b_ + 1<=pMainT_[j].m_)// size of Tj sufficient
00232       {
00233         if (pMainT_[j].pSub_[sub_j].valueIndex_ == (uint64_t)-1)
00234         {
00235           pMainT_[j].pSub_[sub_j] = subtable_cell(x, valueIdx);
00236           count_ ++;
00237           pMainT_[j].b_ ++;
00238           return true;
00239         }
00240         
00241         adjustSubTable(j, subtable_cell(x, valueIdx));
00242         //finish = clock();
00243         //insert_time1_ += finish-start;
00244         return true;
00245       }
00246     }
00247 
00248     //start = clock();
00250     //cout<<"insert: size of Tj is not sufficient\n";
00251     pMainT_[j].m_ = 2* (1<pMainT_[j].m_? pMainT_[j].m_ : 1);
00252     uint64_t tmp_s = pMainT_[j].s_;
00253     pMainT_[j].s_ = 2*pMainT_[j].m_*(pMainT_[j].m_ -1);
00254     sum_s_ = sum_s_ - tmp_s + pMainT_[j].s_;
00255     
00256     if (condition())
00257     {
00258       //double capaciy of Tj
00259       subtable_cell* sub = pMainT_[j].pSub_;
00260       pMainT_[j].pSub_ = new subtable_cell[pMainT_[j].s_];
00261       
00262       memcpy(pMainT_[j].pSub_, sub, tmp_s*sizeof(subtable_cell));
00263       delete sub;
00264       adjustSubTable(j, subtable_cell(x, valueIdx));
00265       //      finish = clock();
00266       //      insert_time2_ += finish-start;
00267       return true;
00268     }
00269     else
00270     {// level-1 hash function is bad.
00271       //cout<<"insert: level-1 hash function is bad.\n";
00272       //      finish = clock();
00273       //      insert_time2_ += finish-start;
00274       return rehashAll(x, valueIdx);
00275     }
00276   }
00277 
00278   virtual bool del(const KeyType& k)
00279   {
00280     uint64_t x = str_hash(k);
00281     
00282     update_count_++;
00283     uint64_t j = hashFunc(main_k_, main_u_,main_p_, mainT_size_, x);
00284     if (pMainT_[j].pSub_ ==NULL)
00285       return false;
00286 
00287     uint64_t sub_j = hashFunc(pMainT_[j].k_, pMainT_[j].u_, pMainT_[j].p_, pMainT_[j].s_, x);
00288 
00289     if (pMainT_[j].pSub_!=NULL && pMainT_[j].pSub_[sub_j].data_==x)
00290     {
00291       pMainT_[j].pSub_[sub_j].valueIndex_ = -1;
00292       count_--;
00293       pMainT_[j].b_--;
00294     }
00295     else
00296       return false;
00297 
00298     if (update_count_>M_)
00299       return rehashAll(0,-1);//(subtable_cell(0, -1));
00300 
00301     return true;
00302   }
00303 
00304   
00305   using AccessMethod<KeyType, ValueType>::update;//bool update(const KeyType& x, const ValueType& data)
00306   virtual bool update(const DataType<KeyType,ValueType>& data)
00307   {
00308     uint64_t x = str_hash(data.key);
00309     
00310     uint64_t j = hashFunc(main_k_, main_u_,main_p_, mainT_size_, x);
00311     
00312     if (pMainT_[j].pSub_ ==NULL)
00313       return false;
00314     
00315     uint64_t sub_j = hashFunc(pMainT_[j].k_, pMainT_[j].u_, pMainT_[j].p_, pMainT_[j].s_, x);
00316     
00317     if (pMainT_[j].pSub_!=NULL && pMainT_[j].pSub_[sub_j].data_==x)
00318     {
00319       dataVec_[pMainT_[j].pSub_[sub_j].valueIndex_] = data.value;
00320       return true;
00321     }
00322     
00323 
00324     return false;
00325   }
00326 
00327   virtual ValueType* find(const KeyType& k)
00328   {
00329     uint64_t x = str_hash(k);
00330     uint64_t j = hashFunc(main_k_, main_u_,main_p_, mainT_size_, x);
00331 
00332     if (pMainT_[j].pSub_ ==NULL || pMainT_[j].b_ == 0)
00333       return NULL;
00334     
00335     uint64_t sub_j = hashFunc(pMainT_[j].k_, pMainT_[j].u_, pMainT_[j].p_, pMainT_[j].s_, x);
00336     
00337     if (pMainT_[j].pSub_!=NULL && pMainT_[j].pSub_[sub_j].data_==x && pMainT_[j].pSub_[sub_j].valueIndex_!=(uint64_t) -1)
00338       return &(dataVec_[pMainT_[j].pSub_[sub_j].valueIndex_]);
00339 
00340     return NULL;
00341   }

00343 friend ostream& operator << ( ostream& os, const SelfType& node)
00344   {
00345     for (uint64_t i=0; i<node.mainT_size_; i++)
00346     {
00347       os<<"\n-------- "<<i<<" --------\n";
00348       os<<node.pMainT_[i]<<"==>";
00349       if (node.pMainT_[i].pSub_ == NULL)
00350         continue;
00351 
00352       subtable_cell* sub = node.pMainT_[i].pSub_;
00353       for (uint64_t j=0; j<node.pMainT_[i].s_; j++)
00354       {
00355         if (sub[j].valueIndex_ == (uint64_t)-1)
00356           continue;
00357         os<<j<<":"<<sub[j]<<", ";
00358       }
00359 
00360       os<<endl;
00361     }
00362 
00363     os<<"\ncount_: "<<node.count_<<"  " ;
00364     os<<"update_count_: "<<node.update_count_<<"  ";
00365     os<<"M_: "<<node.M_<<"  ";
00366     os<<"mainT_size_: "<<node.mainT_size_<<"   ";
00367     os<<"main_k_: "<<node.main_k_<<endl;
00368     os<<"main_u_: "<<node.main_u_<<endl;
00369 
00370     return os;
00371   }

00373   bool save(const string& keyFilename, const string& valueFilename)
00374   {
00375     FILE* f = fopen(keyFilename.c_str(), "w+");
00376     if (f ==NULL)
00377     {
00378       cout<<"\nCan't open file: "<<keyFilename<<endl;
00379       return false;
00380     }
00381 
00382     uint64_t k = 0;
00383     uint64_t arr[8] = 
00384       {
00385         k, count_, update_count_, mainT_size_, M_, main_k_, main_u_, main_p_
00386       }
00387     ;
00388 
00389     if (fwrite(arr, sizeof (arr), 1, f)!=1)
00390       return false;
00391     
00392     
00393     for (uint64_t i=0; i<mainT_size_; i++)
00394     {
00395       if (pMainT_[i].pSub_ == NULL)
00396         continue;
00397       k++;
00398       
00399       if (fwrite(&i, sizeof (uint64_t), 1, f)!=1)
00400         return false;
00401       
00402       if (!pMainT_[i].save(f))
00403         return false;
00404 
00405       subtable_cell* sub = pMainT_[i].pSub_;
00406       for (uint64_t j=0; j<pMainT_[i].s_; j++)
00407       {
00408         if (sub[j].valueIndex_ == (uint64_t)-1)
00409           continue;
00410         if (!sub[j].save(f))
00411           return false;
00412       }
00413       
00414     }
00415 
00416     fseek(f, 0, SEEK_SET);
00417     if (fwrite(&k, sizeof (uint64_t), 1, f)!=1)
00418       return false;
00419     
00420     fclose(f);
00421 
00422     ofstream of(valueFilename.c_str());
00423     oarchive oa(of);
00424     size_t size = dataVec_.size();
00425     oa << size;
00426     
00427     for(typename vector<ValueType>::iterator i =dataVec_.begin(); i!=dataVec_.end(); i++)
00428     {
00429       oa<<(*i);
00430     }
00431 
00432     of.close();
00433     
00434     return true;
00435   }
00436   
00437   bool load(const string& keyFilename, const string& valueFilename)
00438   {
00439     FILE* f = fopen(keyFilename.c_str(), "r");
00440     if (f ==NULL)
00441     {
00442       cout<<"\nCan't open file: "<<keyFilename<<endl;
00443       return false;
00444     }
00445 
00446     uint64_t k = 0;
00447     uint64_t arr[8];
00448     if(fread(arr, sizeof(arr), 1, f)!=1)
00449       return false;
00450 
00451     k = arr[0];
00452     count_ = arr[1];
00453     update_count_ = arr[2];
00454     mainT_size_ = arr[3];
00455     M_ = arr[4];
00456     main_k_ = arr[5];
00457     main_u_ = arr[6];
00458     main_p_ = arr[7];
00459 
00460     if (pMainT_ != NULL)
00461       deleteAll();
00462     pMainT_ = new table_cell[mainT_size_];
00463     
00464     for (uint64_t i=0; i<k; i++)
00465     {
00466       uint64_t u = 0;
00467       if (fread(&u, sizeof (uint64_t), 1, f)!=1)
00468       {
00469         cout<<1<<endl;
00470         return false;
00471       }
00472 
00473       if (!pMainT_[u].load(f))
00474       {
00475         cout<<2<<endl;
00476         return false;
00477       }
00478 
00479       pMainT_[u].pSub_ = new subtable_cell[pMainT_[u].s_];
00480       
00481       for (uint64_t j=0; j<pMainT_[u].b_; j++)
00482       {
00483         subtable_cell d;
00484         if (!d.load(f))
00485         {
00486           cout<<3<<endl;
00487           return false;
00488         }
00489         
00490         uint64_t y = hashFunc(pMainT_[u].k_, pMainT_[u].u_, pMainT_[u].p_, pMainT_[u].s_, d.data_);
00491         pMainT_[u].pSub_[y] = d;
00492       }
00493       //cout<<*this;
00494     }
00495     
00496     fclose(f);
00497 
00498     dataVec_.clear();
00499     
00500     ifstream ifs(valueFilename.c_str());
00501     iarchive ia(ifs);
00502     size_t size;
00503     ia>>size;
00504 
00505     for (size_t i =0; i<size; i++)
00506     {
00507       ValueType v;
00508       ia>>v;
00509       //cout<<v;
00510       dataVec_.push_back(v);
00511     }
00512         
00513     ifs.close();
00514     return true;
00515   }
00516   
00517 protected:
00521   bool rehashAll(uint64_t x, uint64_t valueIdx)
00522   {
00523     subtable_cell* L = NULL;
00524     uint64_t idx = 0;
00525 
00526     if (valueIdx != (uint64_t)-1)
00527       L = new subtable_cell[count_+1];
00528     else
00529       L = new subtable_cell[count_];
00530 
00531     //copy T to L
00532     for (uint64_t i=0; i<mainT_size_; i++)
00533     {
00534       if (pMainT_[i].b_== 0)
00535         continue;
00536 
00537       if (pMainT_[i].pSub_ ==NULL)
00538       {
00539         LDBG_<<"rehashAll() 1:"<<x<<valueIdx;
00540         return false;
00541       }
00542         
00543 
00544       subtable_cell* sub = pMainT_[i].pSub_;
00545       uint64_t s = pMainT_[i].s_;
00546       for (uint64_t j=0; j<s; j++)
00547       {
00548         if (sub[j].valueIndex_ == (uint64_t)-1)
00549           continue;
00550 
00551         L[idx] = sub[j];
00552         idx++;
00553       }
00554         
00555     }
00556       
00557     if (L==NULL || idx != count_)
00558     {
00559       LDBG_<<"rehashAll() 2:"<<x<<valueIdx;
00560       return false;
00561     }
00562     
00564 
00565     if (valueIdx != (uint64_t)-1)
00566     {
00567       L[idx] = subtable_cell(x, valueIdx);
00568       idx++;
00569     }
00570     update_count_ = count_ = idx;
00571 
00572     M_ = (1+c)*(count_>4? count_: 4);
00573 
00574     if (pMainT_ != NULL)
00575       deleteAll();
00576     mainT_size_ = M_*SM_O;
00577     pMainT_ = new table_cell[mainT_size_];
00578 
00579     
00580     int t = 0;
00581     do
00582     {
00583       t++;
00584 
00585       if (t>10)
00586       {
00587         LDBG_<<"rehashAll() 3:"<<x<<valueIdx;
00588         t = 0;//warnings:
00589       }
00590 
00591       random_param(main_k_, main_u_, main_p_);
00592       
00593       for (uint64_t i=0; i<mainT_size_; i++)
00594         pMainT_[i].b_ = 0;
00595       
00596       for (uint64_t i=0; i<count_; i++)
00597       {
00598         uint64_t j= hashFunc(main_k_, main_u_, main_p_, mainT_size_, L[i].data_);
00599         pMainT_[j].b_++;
00600         pMainT_[j].m_ = pMainT_[j].b_ *2;
00601         uint64_t s = pMainT_[j].s_;
00602         pMainT_[j].s_ = 2*pMainT_[j].m_*(pMainT_[j].m_ - 1);
00603         sum_s_ = sum_s_ - s + pMainT_[j].s_;
00604       }
00605     }while (!condition());
00606 
00607     for (uint64_t i=0; i<mainT_size_; i++)
00608         pMainT_[i].b_ = 0;
00609 
00610     uint64_t count = count_;
00611     count_ = 0;
00612     for (uint64_t i=0; i<count; i++)
00613     {
00614       uint64_t j= hashFunc(main_k_, main_u_, main_p_, mainT_size_, L[i].data_);
00615 
00616       if (pMainT_[j].pSub_ == NULL)
00617       {
00618         pMainT_[j].pSub_ = new subtable_cell[pMainT_[j].s_];
00619       }
00620 
00621       subtable_cell* sub = pMainT_[j].pSub_;
00622       uint64_t u = hashFunc(pMainT_[j].k_, pMainT_[j].u_,pMainT_[j].p_, pMainT_[j].s_, L[i].data_);
00623       if (sub[u].valueIndex_ != (uint64_t)-1)
00624       {
00625         adjustSubTable(j, L[i]);
00626       }
00627       else
00628       {
00629         sub[u] = L[i];
00630         pMainT_[j].b_++;
00631         count_++;
00632       }
00633       
00634     }
00635 
00636     if (count_ != count)
00637     {
00638       LDBG_<<"rehashAll() 4:"<<count<<count_;
00639       return false;
00640     }
00641     
00642     delete L;
00643 
00644 //     finish = clock();
00645 //     rehash_time_ += finish-start;
00646     
00647     return true;
00648   }
00649 
00650   bool condition()
00651   {
00652     //clock_t start, finish;
00653     //start= clock();
00654     
00655     if (pMainT_==NULL)return false;
00656 
00657 //     uint64_t s = 0;
00658     
00659 //     for (uint64_t i=0; i<mainT_size_; i++)
00660 //       s += pMainT_[i].s_;
00661 
00662 //     finish = clock();
00663 //     if (sum_s_ != s)
00664 //     {
00665 //       LDBG_<<"condition ERROR: "<<sum_s_<<s;
00666 //     }
00667     
00668     //condition_time_ += finish-start;
00669     
00670     return sum_s_<= (32*M_*M_/mainT_size_ + 4*M_);
00671   }
00672 
00673   uint64_t str_hash(const string& x)
00674   {
00675     uint32_t convkey = 0;
00676     const char* str = (const char*)x.c_str();
00677     for (size_t i = 0; i < x.size(); i++)
00678       convkey = 37*convkey + *str++;
00679 
00680     return convkey;
00681   }
00682 
00683   uint64_t str_hash(uint64_t x)
00684   {
00685     return x;
00686   }
00687   
00688   uint64_t hashFunc(uint64_t a,uint64_t b, uint64_t p, uint64_t s, const uint64_t& x)
00689   {
00690     return ((a*x+b)%p)%s;
00691   }
00692 
00693   void adjustSubTable(uint64_t idx, const subtable_cell& x = subtable_cell(0,-1))
00694   {
00695     //cout<<idx<<" adjustSubTable()\n";
00696     //    clock_t start, finish;
00697     //    start = clock();
00698   
00699     if (idx>=mainT_size_ || idx==(uint64_t)-1 || pMainT_[idx].pSub_ == NULL)
00700       return;
00701 
00702     subtable_cell* L;
00703     if (x.valueIndex_ != (uint64_t)-1)
00704       L = new subtable_cell[pMainT_[idx].b_ + 1];
00705     else
00706       L = new subtable_cell[pMainT_[idx].b_];
00707     
00708     uint64_t u = 0;
00709     subtable_cell* sub = pMainT_[idx].pSub_;
00711     for (uint64_t i=0; i<pMainT_[idx].s_; i++)
00712     {
00713       if (sub[i].valueIndex_ == (uint64_t)-1)
00714         continue;
00715 
00716       L[u] = sub[i];
00717       u++;
00718       sub[i] = subtable_cell(0, -1);
00719     }
00720 
00721     if (u != pMainT_[idx].b_)
00722     {
00723       LDBG_<<"adjustSubTable() 1:"<<pMainT_[idx].b_<<u;
00724       return;
00725     }
00726 
00727     if (x.valueIndex_ != (uint64_t)-1)
00728     {
00729       L[u] = x;
00730       u++;
00731       count_++;
00732       pMainT_[idx].b_++;
00733     }
00734 
00735     bool well = false;
00736     int t = 0;
00737     while (!well)
00738     {
00739       t++;
00740       if (t>10)
00741       {
00742         LDBG_<<"adjustSubTable() 2: Warning..."<<idx;
00743         t = 0;//there are warnings
00744       }
00745       
00746       random_param(pMainT_[idx].k_, pMainT_[idx].u_, pMainT_[idx].p_);
00747       
00748       for (uint64_t i=0; i<pMainT_[idx].s_; i++)
00749         sub[i] = subtable_cell(0, -1);
00750 
00751       uint64_t i=0;
00752       for (; i<u; i++)
00753       {
00754         uint64_t j= hashFunc(pMainT_[idx].k_, pMainT_[idx].u_, pMainT_[idx].p_, pMainT_[idx].s_, L[i].data_ );
00755         //cout<<u<<"  "<<pMainT_[idx].k_<<" "<<pMainT_[idx].u_<<" "<<sub[j].data_<<" "<<L[i].data_<<endl;
00756         if(sub[j].valueIndex_ != (uint64_t)-1)
00757         {
00758           break;
00759         }
00760 
00761         sub[j] = L[i];
00762       }
00763       
00764       if (i==u)
00765         well = true;
00766     }
00767     
00768     delete L;
00769 
00770     //    finish = clock();
00771     //    adjust_time_ += finish - start;
00772     
00773   }
00774   
00775   void deleteAll()
00776   {
00777     for (uint64_t i=0; i<mainT_size_; i++)
00778       deleteSubT(i);    
00779 
00780     delete pMainT_;
00781     pMainT_ = NULL;
00782   }
00783 
00784   void deleteSubT(uint64_t idx)
00785   {
00786     if( pMainT_[idx].pSub_!=NULL)
00787       {
00788         delete pMainT_[idx].pSub_;
00789         pMainT_[idx].pSub_ = NULL;
00790       }
00791 
00792   }
00793   
00794     
00795   static void random_param(uint64_t& a, uint64_t& b, uint64_t& p)
00796   {
00797     p = rand();
00798     a = rand()%p;
00799     b = rand()%p;
00800   }

00804   uint64_t count_;
00805   uint64_t update_count_;
00806   uint64_t M_;
00807   uint64_t mainT_size_;
00808   uint64_t main_k_;
00809   uint64_t main_u_;
00810   uint64_t main_p_;
00811   vector<ValueType> dataVec_;
00812   uint64_t sum_s_;
